item.title: I need a poem
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Roses are triangles,
cars are round,
violets are square,
Mr.P thought that seemed fair.

Violets are red,
as red as your head.
But roses are BLUE,
cried The Who.

I object! said a lawyer,
since he believed:
Roses are brown,
as once said by his private clown.

No, no, said the teacher on the bed,
roses are invisible; that’s what she said.
But then came a walrus,
he said: You are all wrong, neebs!
Since roses are red, violets are blue
and your brains obviously suck like poo.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a poem
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

There once was a girl from Peru,
She had nothing whatsoever to do.
With both legs in the air,
She counted each hair,
Four thousand three-hundred and two.

Don’t you just love dirty limericks?
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=dirty+limericks

item.title: I need a poem
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

Now basketball is my favorite sport
I like the way they dribble up and down the court
I keep it so fresh on the microphone
I like no interruption when the game is on

I like slam-dunks that take me to the hoop
My favorite play is the alley-oop
I like the pick-n-roll
I like the give-n-go
And its basketball Bow Wow lets go

bow wow…fails.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a poem
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Once upon a time in a land far away
in the springtime of the earth on a bright summer day
the king looked out from his grand tower
and flexed the muscle of his regal power.

Every day for fifty years
the king would drink sixty beers.
And every night for four decades
the king had sex with all the maids.

The king ate beef and chicken and pig,
There was no cake he did not dig.
He made love in every hole
Insane pleasure his only goal!

Of course one day the old guy died,
Nobody cared and his wife just sighed.
Don’t be him love life and be free,
Heaven is on earth if you take time to see.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a poem
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Oops…

Let me see if I can come up with anything better…

EDIT: I got nothing…

But I found this through google!

If you think you are beaten, you are.
If you think you dare not, you don’t!
If you like to win, but think you can’t,
It’s almost a cinch you won’t.

If you think you’ll lose, you’re lost;
For out in the world we find
Success begins with a fellow’s will;
It’s all in the state of mind.

If you think you are outclassed, you are,
You’ve got to think high to rise,
You’ve got to be sure of yourself before
You can ever win a prize.

Life’s battles don’t always go
To the stronger or faster man
But sooner or later the man who wins
Is the man who THINKS HE CAN.

Maybe change it around a tiny bit.

Read full topic
